mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EDU ( edu_code, SEA_CODE, edu_name, descript, teacher_nm, level, contents, recruit_sdt, recruit_edt, edu_sdt, edu_edt, edu_time, place, edu_state, edu_capacity, reg_id, reg_date, upt_id, upt_date ) VALUES ( #{eduCode}, #{seasonCode}, #{eduName}, #{descript}, #{teacherName}, #{eduLevel}, #{eduContents}, #{recruitStartDate}, #{recruitEndDate}, #{eduStartDate}, #{eduEndDate}, #{eduTime}, #{eduPlace}, #{eduState}, #{eduCapaity}, #{regId}, #{regDt}, #{uptId}, #{uptDt} )
